attributes.action: Make motor insurance non compulsory, this will seriously change the way premiums are calculated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All of the insurance companies rip of the drivers of this country with their extorionate prices, by making motor insurance non compulsory they would be forced to take a long hard look at premiums in the coming years.  Many people are priced out of owning newer more efficient vehicles due to the exorbitant insurance costs.  Insurance would then be the choice of the owner of a vehicle (as exists in the US).
